Media.MediaTitle: skin cancer, squamous cell carcinoma, face and leg

PermissionInformation.Comment: Original source of photographs: Kelly Nelson (Genetics Board Member); unrestricted permission for reuse

Diagnoses.Diagnosis: squamous cell carcinoma of the skin

ContentDescriptions.ContentDescription: Photographs showing a pink, raised lesion on the skin of the face (left panel) and on the skin of the leg (right panel).

Photographs showing the side of a person’s face with a skin cancer lesion that looks raised and crusty (left panel) and a person’s leg with a skin cancer lesion that looks pink and raised (right panel).

En las fotografías, se muestra el costado del rostro de una persona con una lesión de cáncer de piel de aspecto levantado y costroso (panel izquierdo) y la pierna de una persona con una lesión de cáncer de piel de aspecto levantado y de color rosa (panel derecho).

Captions.MediaCaption: Squamous cell carcinoma. Squamous cell carcinoma on the face (left panel) and squamous cell carcinoma on the leg (right panel).
Squamous cell carcinoma. A skin cancer lesion on the face that looks raised and crusty (left panel) and a skin cancer lesion on the leg that looks pink and raised (right panel).

Carcinoma de células escamosas. Lesión de cáncer de piel en el rostro de aspecto levantado y costroso (panel izquierdo) y lesión de cáncer de piel en la pierna de aspecto levantado y de color rosa (panel derecho).

ProcessingStatus.Comment: Missing caption and content description for Spanish patient summary.
